data.comment: Today's referee, Hiroyuki Kimura, has blown to start the match.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Sendai.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Kashima.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 18, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sendai throw-in in Kashima's half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Sendai.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
In the minute 23, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sendai.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Sendai drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Kashima.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sendai, Sendai push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 29, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sendai a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kashima's Everaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Kashima advance rapidly upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura blows for offside.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Sendai.
Hiroyuki Kimura will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Tatsuki Nara (Kashima) has received a yellow card from Hiroyuki Kimura.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Shuhei Akasaki with Shun Nagasawa.
Kashima's Everaldo scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Juan Alano to set up the goal.
In the minute 49, In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Sendai make their fourth substitution with Yoshiki Matsushita replacing Shingo Hyodo.
In the minute 52, Takashi Kiyama is making the team's second substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Koji Hachisuka replacing Para.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Goal! Kashima extend their lead to 0-2 through Juan Alano.
In the minute 59, Isaac Cuenca is on a sub for Takayoshi Ishihara for Sendai.
Kashima's Everaldo fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Goal! Ayase Ueda extends Kashima's lead to 0-3.
Everaldo with an assist there.
At Yurtec Stadium, Kashima are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 72, Kashima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Yasushi Endo is replacing Shoma Doi for Kashima at Yurtec Stadium.
The away team have replaced Everaldo with Sho Ito. This is the second substitution made today by Zago.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Shun Nagasawa (Sendai) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-3.
In the minute 76, That's a fine assist from Koji Hachisuka.
Kunimitsu Sekiguchi is replacing Hiroto Yamada for the home team.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Kashima at Yurtec Stadium.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Zago (Kashima) is making a third substitution, with Kei Koizumi replacing Shuto Yamamoto.
In the minute 86, Free kick Kashima.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sendai a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Shintaro Nago is replacing Juan Alano for Kashima at Yurtec Stadium.
